solution_line_template: The first cut will result in {initial_cloth_size} / {cut_divisor} = <<{initial_cloth_size}/{cut_divisor}={first_cut_size}>>{first_cut_size} square inches of fabric.
The second cut will result in {first_cut_size} / {cut_divisor} = <<{first_cut_size}/{cut_divisor}={second_cut_size}>>{second_cut_size} square inches of fabric.
Fatima will have donated a total of {first_cut_size} + {second_cut_size} = <<{first_cut_size}+{second_cut_size}={total_donated_cloth}>>{total_donated_cloth} square inches of fabric.
